i1.blurb: While unburrowed Rek'Sai generates Fury with her basic attacks and spells. When burrowed Rek'Sai consumes Fury to heal herself.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Rek'Sai''' generates {{tip|fury|{{as|25 Fury}}}} upon dealing damage with [[basic attack]], {{ai|Prey Seeker|Rek'Sai}}, {{ai|Unburrow|Rek'Sai}} or {{ai|Furious Bite|Rek'Sai}}, and loses {{as|20 Fury}} per second if she hasn't generated any in the last 5 seconds.

While {{sbc|{{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai|burrowed}}}}, '''Rek'Sai''' consumes her current {{as|Fury}} over 3 seconds, {{tip|healing}} up to {{sti|health|{{as|{{pp|20 to 190}} health}}}} at {{as|100 Fury}}, stopping once she consumes it all or returns to {{sti|health|{{as|full health}}}}.
i1.name: Fury of the Xer'Sai
notes: * Fury bar changes from yellow to red when full.

q1.blurb: Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks deal bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.
description: {{sbc|{{ai|Unburrow|Rek'Sai|Unburrowed}} - Active:}} '''Rek'Sai's''' next three basic attacks within 5 seconds deal {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}} to her target and all surrounding enemies. The damage to the primary target can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} for {{as|100% {{critical damage|100}} '''bonus''' physical damage}}.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|20 to 40}} {{as|(+ 50% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|20*3 to 40*3}} {{as|(+ 150% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
q1.name: Queen's Wrath
notes: * ''Queen's Wrath'' ends and goes on cooldown if '''Rek'Sai''' is {{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai|burrowed}} for more than 1 second.
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Queen's Wrath'' has a fixed attack animation forbidding ''Rek'Sai'' from attacking faster if she has over {{as|{{tt|{{fd|2.0}} attack speed|Estimated}}}}.
* ''Queen's Wrath's'' enhanced attacks apply other [[on-hit effect]]s, on-attack effects, and [[life steal]] but do not affect structures. The damage to additional targets is not affected by these.

* ''Queen's Wrath'' can be mitigated ({{tip|splash damage}} still applies) if {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}}, {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}}, {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}}, and/or if ''Rek'Sai'' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.
* The splash damage does not apply {{ii|Hunter's Talisman}}.

q2.blurb: While Burrowed, Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that deals Physical Damage and reveals enemies hit.
description: {{sbc|{{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai|Burrowed}} - Active:}} '''Rek'Sai''' fires a void-charged pulse in a target direction, stopping at the first enemy hit, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies in the area and {{tip|sight|revealing}} them for {{fd|2.5}} seconds.
q2.name: ''Prey Seeker''
notes: * No additional details.

w1.blurb: Rek'Sai burrows into the ground, gaining new abilities and increased Movement Speed. Her vision range is reduced and she cannot use basic attacks.
description: {{sbc|{{ai|Unburrow|Rek'Sai|Unburrowed}} - Active:}} '''Rek'Sai''' burrows into the ground, {{tip|disarm|self-disarming}} and reducing her sight radius to 250, but gaining {{pp|4|15 to 30|1 to 16|color=ms}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, becoming {{tip|ghosted}}, accessing an alternate set of basic [[Champion ability|abilities]], and activating ''Tremor Sense''.
{{sbc|Tremor Sense:}} '''Rek'Sai''' gains {{tip|obscured vision}} of nearby enemy and neutral units in fog of war every {{fd|1.5}} seconds if they are moving.
w1.name: Burrow
notes: * '''Rek'Sai''' Immediately burrows on respawn once she has at least one point in ''Burrow''.
* ''Burrow'' has no cast time and does not interrupt '''Rek'Sai's''' previous orders.
* Enemies detected by ''Tremor Sense'' are displayed as rings on the ground (champions display much larger ones and play a sound effect for ''Rek'Sai'').
** Enemies standing still while ''Rek'Sai'' is nearby are insensible to ''Tremor Sense''.
* ''Burrow'' briefly {{tip|slow|slows}} displaced enemies.

w2.blurb: While Burrowed, Rek'Sai may cast Un-burrow to knock up and damage nearby enemies.
w2.customlabel: {{tt|On-Target Cooldown|Unaffected by cooldown reduction (begins after the target is displaced)}}
description: {{sbc|{{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai|Burrowed}} - Active:}} '''Rek'Sai''' bursts out of the ground, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to surrounding enemies and {{tip|airborne|knocking them aside}} 250 units. The enemy closest to the center is {{tip|airborne|knocked up}} for 1 second instead, and cannot be affected again by ''Unburrow'' for some time.
'''Rek'Sai''' can also trigger ''Unburrow'' by issuing an attack command, applying the full {{tip|airborne|knock up}} against her target.
w2.name: Unburrow
notes: * ''Unburrow's'' per-target cooldown only applies to targets affected by the full {{tip|airborne|knock-up}}, but provides immunity to all effects of the ability.
* ''Unburrow'' has no cast time and does not interrupt '''Rek'Sai's''' previous orders.
* ''Unburrow'' is still considered an ability and is thus stopped by {{tip|silence}}. She can basic attack normally during this time, without leaving ''unburrow''.

e1.blurb: Rek'Sai bites her target, dealing double and True Damage if she has max Fury.
description: {{sbc|{{ai|Unburrow|Rek'Sai|Unburrowed}} - Active:}} '''Rek'Sai''' bites the target enemy, dealing {{as|physical damage}}.
At maximum {{tip|fury|{{as|Fury}}}} the damage is doubled and converted to {{tip|true damage}}.
e1.name: Furious Bite
notes: * No additional details.

e2.blurb: While Burrowed, Rek'Sai creates a re-usable, long lasting tunnel. Enemies can destroy it by standing on top of either entrance.
e2.customlabel: {{tt|On-Target Cooldown|Unaffected by cooldown reduction (begins after Rek'Sai exits the tunnel)}}
description: {{sbc|{{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai|Burrowed}} - Active:}} '''Rek'Sai''' {{tip|dashes}} in the cursor's direction, leaving behind a ''Tunnel'' with two interconnected entrances, lasting up to 10 minutes. The ''Tunnel'' can be traversed again if '''Rek'Sai''' targets either entrance, shutting down the ''Tunnel'' for a few seconds.
'''Rek'Sai''' can have up to 8 pairs of entrances active on the map at the same time. Enemy {{tip|champions}} can destroy a ''Tunnel'' by standing on either entrance for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
e2.name: Tunnel
notes: * ''Tunnel'' entrances can be targeted by allied movement abilities ({{ai|Leap Strike|Jax}}, {{ai|Shunpo|Katarina}}, {{ai|Safeguard|Lee Sin}}) and by {{si|Teleport}}.
* ''Tunnel'' entrances are visible on allied champions' minimaps, while enemies must first gain {{tip|sight}} of one before it becomes visible on theirs (the opposite entrance is not revealed).
* Enemy champions that destroy a ''Tunnel'' are each granted {{g|5}}.
** Destroying a ''Tunnel'' while ''Rek'Sai'' is traversing it will not prevent her from reaching the opposite entrance.
* ''Rek'Sai'' exits a ''Tunnel'' the same way she entered (either {{ai|Unburrow|Rek'Sai|Unburrowed}} or {{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai|Burrowed}}, no switching).

** An {{ai|Unburrow|Rek'Sai|Unburrowed}} ''Rek'Sai'' is considered to be {{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai|Burrowed}} while inside a ''Tunnel''. She will gain her {{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai|Burrowed}} abilities (unusable) suffer from {{tip|nearsight}}, and activate ''Tremor Sense'', but will not be healed by {{ai|Fury of the Xer'Sai|Rek'Sai}} (unless {{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai|Burrowed}} prior to entering the ''Tunnel'').
* ''Rek'Sai'' can ''Tunnel'' through walls if she dashes close to them and the wall is thin enough to allow the opposite entrance to spawn on the other side.

r1.blurb: Rek'Sai dives underground and leaps towards her target, dealing massive damage.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Rek'Sai's''' applies ''Mark as Prey'' to enemy champions she damaged in the last 5 seconds.

{{sbc|Active:}}  '''Rek'Sai''' selects an enemy champion with ''Mark as Prey'' and {{tip|vanish|vanishes}} into the ground. After {{fd|1.5}} seconds, she emerges from the ground near her target and {{tip|dash|pounces}} a fixed distance in their direction to deal {{as|physical damage}} ''if'' she hits them.
''The damage can only be dodged if the target moves 1500 units away.''
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|100 to 400}} {{as|(+ 175% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|20 to 30}}% of target's '''missing''' health)}}}}
r1.name: Void Rush
notes: * ''Rek'Sai'' can activate ''Void Rush'' while {{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai|Burrowed}} or {{ai|Unburrow|Rek'Sai|Unburrowed}}.

* The target champion will glow once ''Rek'Sai'' {{ai|Burrow|Rek'Sai|Burrows}} to them, followed by a global screech (''will be heard by enemies even if they don't have {{tip|sight}} of '''Rek'Sai''' and/or her destination'').
